Summary Note:
Moretti Russo and the RM met at a networking event in Rome. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Moretti Russo is a seasoned professional with over 26 years of experience.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Moretti Russo and Elisabetta have been married since 2004. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Moretti graduated from Liceo Scientifico Leonardo da Vinci Milano in 1994.
Moretti completed his university education at IMT Institute for Advanced Studies Lucca in 1999.
Occupation History:
Moretti Russo is a seasoned professional with over 26 years of experience.
At Grimaldi Group S.p.A., Moretti Russo held the position of Ship Broker from 1999 to 2003, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Shipping Company Owner at Grimaldi Group S.p.A. in 2004, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 270000 EUR.
He has villa located in Cagliari, worth 2490000 EUR.

He purchased house in Perugia, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1078000 EUR.
Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Bari, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The house is valued at 1142000 EUR.


Following the passing of his father, a successful Venture Capitalist, he received an inheritance of 4900000 EUR in 2012, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Moretti as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
